Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Clippers start the season at home against the Phoenix Suns.
Los Angeles finished 51-31 overall and 30-22 in Western Conference games a season ago.
The Clippers gave up 112.3 points per game while committing 18.5 fouls last season.
Phoenix went 49-33 overall and 9-9 in Pacific Division play during the 2023-24 season.
The Suns allowed opponents to score 113.2 points per game and shoot 46.4% from the field last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Suns -4.5; over/under is 224
